title: What Indian script is the easiest to read and write? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tamil. Tamil alone among the scripts of the Indian subcontinent does not possess conjunct consonants representing consonant clusters, which can be insanely complicated and highly unpredictable in construction in all the other scripts. Each consonant is written one after the other with a tiny dot above them to short that there are no intervening vowels. A highly lucid system.
